data.title: The Album (compilation) – MuseWiki: Supermassive wiki for the band Muse
data.text:
Compilation Name The Album[1][2] Tracks 39[2] Total length Unknown Recorded Unknown Writer/composer Matthew Bellamy et al. Producer Unknown Art work Unknown Publisher EMI[spurious][note 1] Format(s) 2CD[2] Catalogue № 0724381035726 Release date 16th April 2001[2] compilation chronology Brit Awards 2001: Album of the Year

←

The Album

→

Crossing All Over Vol. 13

A compilation of hit tracks from 2001.
